description.narrative: As of 2019, government institutions and child protection networks at national and community levels are equipped to increase coordination and use common standards in the protection of children against violence, including GBV.,which contributes to Data And Child Protection, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: staff costs

sector.narrative: Services to prevent or respond to violence, exploitation and abuse
Social and behaviour change communication on violence, exploitation and abuse
Violence, exploitation, and abuse - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order human rights affairs
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities policy, planning and administration

title.narrative: Colombia United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2016 Colombia: Auto-evaluación de la implementación del modelo de Educación en el Riesgo de Minas en situaciones de emergencia de DAICMA-UNICEF (2014-2015)
2019 Colombia: Evaluación de resultados de las acciones de inclusión de familias con niñas niños y adolescentes con discapacidad en Familias en Acción (2012-2018)
Colombia 2018 Annual Report on Results for Children
Colombia 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Colombia 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: As of 2019, government institutions and child protection networks at national and community levels are equipped to increase coordination and use common standards in the protection of children against violence, including GBV.

description.narrative: UNICEF Colombia mobilized public and private counterparts and facilitated inter-sectorial alliances and coordination mechanisms, both at national and local levels, to prioritize the prevention and response to violence against children, especially gender-based violence, and to guarantee access to justice for children. UNICEF is supporting Colombia as a Pathfinding country to develop a National Action Plan to Address Violence Against Children. | Status:Met | As-of Date:09/09/2019

title.narrative: Number of new technical tools for child protection (v. gr., protocols and routes) against violence that are aligned with international standards and validated by national committees and priority local committees.
Number of children without parental or family care provided with appropriate alternative care arrangements [COVIDSitRep]
Number of children, parents and primary caregivers provided with community based mental health and psychosocial support and messaging [COVIDSitRep]
